metadata.subject: Land subdivision
Land use
Environmental protection
metadata.title: Draft environmental guidelines for the review of subdivisions in Alberta
metadata.creator: Bramm, Richard
Alberta. Alberta Environmental Protection. Environmental Regulatory Services
Alberta. Environmental Assessment Division
metadata.publisher: Edmonton : Alberta Environmental Protection, Environmental Regulatory Service, Environmental Assessment Division, Standards and Guidelines Branch
metadata.description: Ch.1 - Introduction to the guidelines -- Ch.2 - Guidelines for the evaluation of groundwater supply for unserviced residential subdivisions -- Ch.3 - Guidelines for the evaluation of water table conditions and soil percolation rate for unserviced residential subdivisions -- Ch.4 - Guidelines for the evaluation of river flooding and erosion hazards for residential subdivisions -- Ch.5 - Guidelines for the evaluation of hazards to residential subdivisions from valley slopes -- Ch.6 - Guidelines for the evaluation of lake residential subdivisions -- Appendices
System requirements for online access: Adobe Acrobat

Alberta Government Library*Previously published as "Interim guidelines for the evaluation of water table conditions and soil percolation rate for unserviced residential subdivisions - GB 992 A3 A333 1994 and Interim guidelines for the subdivision of land adjacent to steep valley banks - HD 319 A3 A334 1994 and Interim guidelines for the evaluation of groundwater supply for unserviced residential subdivisions using privately owned domestic water wells - TD 405 A333 1994"
metadata.notes: No title page found. No copyright page found.
